citations.desc: Records: Operators of auction sales and brokers.
citations.narrative:
No records were available that provided disposition information including the name and address of the buyer for all the
animals that were recently sold. The licensee informed the inspector that all the animals (hedgehogs and tenrec) have
been sold and they are no longer conducting regulated business. Per this regulation, brokers must maintain records which
fully disclose information concerning each animal sold whether or not there is a commission fee charged.
Correct by: Oct 30, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.76(a)(2) 
   
Records: Operators of auction sales and brokers. 
No records were available that provided disposition information including the name and address of the buyer for all the 
animals that were recently sold. The licensee informed the inspector that all the animals (hedgehogs and tenrec) have 
been sold and they are no longer conducting regulated business. Per this regulation, brokers must maintain records which 
fully disclose information concerning each animal sold whether or not there is a commission fee charged.  
Correct by: Oct 30, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
